All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AlreadyConsumedCodeException
Signals that the OneTimeCode has already been consumed.
AlreadyGeneratedCodeException
Signals that the OneTimeCode has already been generated.
Ballot
An interface modeling the Ballot.
BallotBuilder
A Ballot builder interface.
BallotImpl
A Ballot implementation.
BallotImpl.Builder
A BallotBuilder's implementation.
Choice
An implementation of a choice in a Election.
CodeManager<C>
An interface modeling a OneTimeCode manager, which exposes functions to generate, (in)validate and verify one-time-codes.
CodeManagerImpl<C>
A base implementation of CodeManager which implements main core logic, independent of any technology.
CodeRepository<C>
An interface with method to store/retrieve from a data source the one-time-codes data.
Election
An interface modeling a voting.
ElectionBuilder
The Election builder interface.
ElectionFactory
A factory for an Election.
ElectionImpl
The Election implementation.
ElectionImpl.Builder
An ElectionBuilder's implementation.
ElectionInfo
An interface modeling the informative aspect of an Election
ElectionInfoBuilder
A builder for ElectionInfo.
ElectionInfoImpl
An ElectionInfo implementation.
ElectionInfoImpl.Builder
An ElectionBuilder's implementation.
ElectionManager
An interface modeling an Election manager.
ElectionManagerImpl
An implementation of ElectionManager.
FixedVotes
A collection of fixed Choices.
NotValidCodeException
Signals that the OneTimeCode is not valid.
OneTimeCode
An interface modeling a one-time-code, i.e.
OneTimeCodeImpl
A simple OneTimeCode implementation.
Utils
Implementation of some utils.
